general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Neptune enhances your intuition and sensitivity. It is a favorable moment to listen to your heart and connect with your deep emotions. The astral influences encourage you to reflect on your desires and needs, both personally and professionally.
love: Dare to express your feelings, vulnerability is your strength today.
work: Avoid conflicts, prioritize collaboration to progress in your projects.
health: Take a moment to recharge, meditation or a walk in nature will do you good.
advice: Trust your instinct, it guides you.
